div.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Nov. 28, 1935. GREEK VETERANS' DANCE

body.p: The dance sponsored by the Greek war veterans of the "George Dillboy Chapter," which took place in the West End Women's Club last Sunday night, was a tremendous success. This was no small achievement, since there were three other large affairs and two dramatic performances were also being held the same evening.
Besides the ballroom dancing, the guests were entertained by an artistic program. Everyone was eager to help in every way the brave war veterans in the hospitals.
